name: Space Stuck
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for BenBonk Game Jam #2.

Can you move yourself and the walls around you at the same time...? Now is the time to find out.

The theme for the jam was "Limited Space", and you'll see why later when you play this game!

Good luck, player!

P.S Check out BenBonk, he's a really awesome game developer and was the host of the jam this game was submitted to. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLO_c9nyLCwohHqovjlmpDw
